name: Homepage of Manuel Holtgrewe
body:
This is the personal homepage of Manuel Holtgrewe.
I am currently a PhD candidate at ([Freie Universit√§t Berlin](http://www.mi.fu-berlin.de/en/inf/groups/abi/members/Scientific_Staff/holtgrewe.html)), working on sequence analysis and contributing to the [SeqAn C++ library](http://www.seqan.de).
I am currently funded through the [BMBF VIP](http://www.bmbf.de/de/2391.php) project [SeqAn BioStore](http://www.seqan-biostore.de).

## Publication List

### 2012

* David Weese, Manuel Holtgrewe, and Knut Reinert. ["RazerS 3: faster, fully sensitive read mapping."](http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/28/20/2592.abstract) Bioinformatics 28.20 (2012): 2592-2599.

### 2011

* Manuel Holtgrewe, Anne-Katrin Emde, David Weese, and Knut Reinert. ["A novel and well-defined benchmarking method for second generation read mapping."](http://www.biomedcentral.com/1471-2105/12/210) BMC bioinformatics 12.1 (2011): 210.

### 2010

* Manuel Holtgrewe, Peter Sanders, and Christian Schulz. ["Engineering a scalable high quality graph partitioner."](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpls/abs_all.jsp?arnumber=5470485) Parallel & Distributed Processing (IPDPS), 2010 IEEE International Symposium on. IEEE, 2010.
* Marcel Birn, Manuel Holtgrewe, Peter Sanders, and Johannes Singler. ["Simple and Fast Nearest Neighbor Search."](https://www.siam.org/proceedings/alenex/2010/alx10_005_birnm.pdf) ALENEX. 2010.

### 2009

* Manuel Holtgrewe. ["A scalable coarsening phase for a multi-level graph partitioning algorithm."](/a/dipl/diplthesis.pdf) Master's thesis, University of Karlsruhe (2009).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
